"My name is Lise and I'm 27. My life is like most people: I'm married, I've got a child and a my husband works a lot.

What about me? I'm a novelist. I wrote a book entitled "Listhère". My psychiatrist  advised me to do this following my car accident beacause this shock made me amnesiac and in his opinion, writing could allow me to have my memories back again.

That's why I got into this career.

But one strange thing happened once my book was published: every single day was sent to me a mysterious letter telling me that Listhère really exists.

And if it was true?

Could this city help me to find who I really am?

What would you have done if you were me? "

Play as Lise in her quest for an answer and go to Listhère!

Explore this strange city by solving puzzles to progress, make choices based on the "Butterfly Effect" concept and don't forget to keep an eye on Lise's anxiety gauge because to much pressure, panic or fear can drive her to death!

The anxiety:

Lise is prone to frequent anxiety attacks.

If fear arises, his anxiety rises as a function of it.

At each threshold reached, Lise will suffer from side effects.

When her anxiety level goes up to 100%, Lise has a stroke.

However, her anxiety gradually decreases if nothing happens and she can use various medications to decrease it instantly.

Endurance :

Lise can run by pressing the "Shift" key on your keyboard.

However, an endurance gauge will appear next to it.

If the gauge is empty, Lise will stop to catch her breath.

In addition, his stamina will increase more slowly for a short time, due to his shortness of breath.

At a certain level of anxiety, the stamina will drain more quickly and take longer to recharge.

Difficulty level :

From the start of the adventure, you will have the choice between "Naive" or "Unconscious" mode.

Naive mode is the normal difficulty of the game.

The unconscious mode is the difficult difficulty of the game, it will be appreciated by players enjoying the challenges:

- No safeguard proposed before passages at risk.

- Anxiety during crises increases more quickly.

- Bosses are harder to finish.

- Less consumable items.

- The puzzles are more difficult.

- The tests are more difficult.

It will be impossible during the game to change the difficulty level, so be sure of yourself before starting a game.

An official Guide is available (french version) on this link: https://www.calameo.com/read/00623958...

At the end of the demo, you will be asked to fill out a very short form to collect your opinion on the gaming experience.

We hope you have a good time playing this demo.
